name: Lightbender
description: Lightbender is a bright, colorful, and fun puzzle game based on the physics of light. Use prisms, mirrors, lenses, and dark matter to change the color and direction of light to solve each grid.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Works best on widescreen displays (16:9 or wider)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD (or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Works best on widescreen displays (16:9 or wider)

reviews.review_text: Ive spent to much time on this. Its not bad, but its far from ideal in the developed world.

Has some cool mechanics, although needs improvement technically (mouse support, rotate while item is selected) but other than that, it has potential. Look forward to seeing updates to this game to make it a better purchase and easier to recommend.

The game is worth every penny. It makes fun, has lots and lots of levels and is quite challenging. Definitely needs some tweaks and improvements, but you can play it without problems in it's current state. A must have for every braintickling puzzle game fanatic.
